item.title: Guide
item.description: Welcome 2021-03-10, FCA Collin This guide contains information for stakeholders about methods used in when I develop programs. This is still a fairly new initiative and is likely to strongly evolve in the coming months. Under The Hood This is an example of static web page generated with Hugo. No big knowledge of html, Hugo comes with ready-to-use features, further augmented by themes . For instance, the learn theme used for these pages has nice features for project documentation, included but not restricted to:
